message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. It's a great value considering its worth to you is $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. I'm unable to lower the price below $90 for this product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $89 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I'm willing to meet you at $88. Can we call it a deal?
